name: ideal_weight
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fitness_calculator.
Tool description: Find "body fat percentage",  "ideal weight", "BMI", "daily calory requirement" and some macro nutrients with this api.
API description: Find four different ideal weight scores according to four different well-known equations which are Hamwi, Devine, Miller, Robinson.  There are two parameters which are age and height(cm) values.

gender.description: The gender of the individual ('male' or 'female').

height.description: The height of the individual in centimeters.
